content: this was created as a supplement for a crochet class i teach at my lys the pattern includes instructions and schematics to make the jasmine stitch tree ornament worked flat and also the jasmine stitch coasters worked in the round you can use any yarn and any hook size due to the nature of the stitch gauge is not critical all of my samples are made using malabrigo rios which is 100% sw merino wool you can use any yarn for the tree however for the coaster i recommend a natural fiber you don t want synthetic fibers in something that could get very hot because it could melt
